Entries.Introduction: Hello! You must be @, the new farmer. I'm {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/CarolineName}}.#$e#My {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Husband:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreGender}}}} runs the general store here. And have you met my daughter, {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AbigailName}}? She's the pale one with the purple hair.
Entries.Thu: #$1 Caroline1#Hmmm... I wonder if I can get {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreName}} to cook dinner tonight.#$e#Hmmm... what am I going to make for dinner tonight?#$e#Maybe I'll just get take-out from the Saloon.
Entries.Fri: It's a fine-looking day.#$e#On days like this I like to help {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/EvelynName}} with the public gardens.#$e#She's strong for her age, but I think she appreciates all the help she can get.
Entries.Sat: Is it just me, or does {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AbigailName}} have an unhealthy interest in doom and gloom?#$e#Maybe I'm just too old to understand.
Entries.Sat_inlaw_Abigail: Dinner's been a lot quieter since {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AbigailName}} moved out...#$e#No, not because she used to chew with her mouth open!$h
Entries.Sat2: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AbigailNickname}}'s always had a strange interest in the occult. I'm not sure where she gets it from...
Entries.Sat4: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AbigailNickname}}'s always had a strange interest in the occult. I'm not sure where she gets it from...
Entries.Sat6: #$1 Caroline12#When we first moved here, I took a while to settle down... I wasn't ready for the domestic life.#$e#{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreName}}'s a bit traditional... but {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreGender}}}}'s a good {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Man:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreGender}}}}. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreGender}}}}'s ambitious, but {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreGender}}}} always puts {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/His:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreGender}}}} family first.
Entries.summer_Sat: Is it just me, or does {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AbigailName}} look a little pale?#$e#Maybe I'm just worrying about her too much.
Entries.summer_Sat_inlaw_Abigail: How's {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AbigailName}}'s health? She's always been such a pale girl. Hopefully the farm lifestyle puts a little color in her cheeks.
Entries.fall_Mon: Fall is {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AbigailNickname}}'s favorite season, so I'm hoping she'll come out of her room more often.
Entries.fall_Mon_inlaw_Abigail: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AbigailNickname}} was taking online classes here, but I don't think her heart was really in it...#$e#She's a free spirit, like I was before I met {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreName}}. She's probably having the time of her life on your farm.
Entries.winter_Sat: Don't you think {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AbigailNickname}} would look better with her natural hair color?#$e#She used to have light chestnut-colored hair.

Entries.fall_25.002: Excuse me, I have to say some things to Doctor {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HarveyName}} in private...$u
Entries.Tue.001: You're looking really fit, {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/JodiName}}! Those dumbells do wonders, don't they?
Entries.winter_16.000: I'm getting all my holiday shopping done tonight! Let me know if you see {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreName}} coming...

BeforeMovie.Text: '{0}'... I have no idea what this is about! I hope it's not violent.

AfterMovie.Text: That wasn't bad! I'll have to ask {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AbigailName}} about it when I'm home, I'm sure she's seen it.$h

BeforeMovie.Text: I have a feeling this one's going to be a let-down... But I'm still interested to give it a try.

AfterMovie.Text: That was silly... I bet {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreName}} would like it.$s
